titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Georg Henrik von Wright, [19. 9. 1948]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (von Wright, S. 59).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: This is just to thank you for your last short letter from Cambridge. I shall be back in London on the 29th & I intend to go to Cambridge on the 30th, or October 1st. I'm looking forward to seeing you. There are many things I should like to talk to you about. So long.
